items.text: length and in at off, looks to drive on the up, it comes back to the bowler off the inside half
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, drops it to slips's right with soft hands
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: short and up at the ribs. Defended to midwicket with both feet off the ground
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: yorker length outside off, jammed to mid-off's left
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on leg stump, defended into the leg side
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length ball wide outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: googly, at a length outside off. Dead-batted on the front foot
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: inside edge snicks the stumps but the bails have stayed on! Full outside off. Looks to drill through the off side without getting close to the pitch of this. That gets the outside of leg stump and trickles fine
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, pushed through. Flicked to midwicket's right
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: lbw appeal turned down. They won't review. Replays show there was an inside edge on that attempted flick. He was hurried and yorked himself trying to hit that leg stump ball
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length on off stump, defended off the back foot
items.postText: Sajed : "@Naim Noor Ahmed The thing is that Mahmadullah is a key player. During the previous international series, he has been a key part in changing the dynamics of the game. Bangladesh needs to practice playing overseas more, and Ireland is a great way for World Cup practice (England would be ideal)"
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length ball slanted in at off stump, tapped back to the bowler who doesn't collect cleanly to his left
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, leaps and chops to third man
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, defended to point
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: bouncer too short at a leg stump line. Ducks and lets it go
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: great timing. Mithun with the balance as he drives through the off side. Overpitched ball outside off and he chops down on it, without too much of a follow through. In front of cover
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: short ball up at the hips. Gets on top of it and drops it to the keeper's left to pinch a single. Clutches his hamstring as he complete the run at the other end
items.postText: Out comes the physio to have a look at Mithun. On his feet now.
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, driven to long-on
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, clipped to midwicket's right
items.postText: Ayush Kapoor: "Mithun has showed great composure in both of his inning. Hopefully this cramp doesn't affect his innings."
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, cut to sweeper
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on off, defended from the crease
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: top edge onto grille as he looks to play the reverse. Length ball on off and he can't get it away
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, leans in and flicks behind square into the vacant area there. Jogs carefully back for the second. No urgency there at all
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: nicely placed. Short and wide from Boult, but not a lot of bounce on that. He kept his head on top of this and sliced it to backward point's left
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: short and wide outside off, mistimed cut to cover
items.shortText: Boult to Sabbir Rahman, no run
